issue.title: CHANGELOG.md in 5.0.0 does not list the changes from 4.0.0 and 4.0.1.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13460](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13460). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I can't find below.
1. Apache Arrow 4.0.1 (2021-05-19) 
1. Apache Arrow 4.0.0 (2021-04-21)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13460?focusedCommentId=17389176) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
`[~kszucs]` Do you have any idea to resolve this? This is caused by releasing from release branch.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13460?focusedCommentId=17478340) by Masaaki Yoshikawa (orz--):*
I can find fixes.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/apache/arrow/apache-arrow-6.0.1/CHANGELOG.md

I can't find fixes.
